backend/main.mo: Primary LandCanister backend implementing land data structures, user profiles, loot, modifiers, and gameplay logic.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for fully reinstalling Land and Asset canisters on mainnet and reinitializing them after backing up state.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist covering environment configuration and required variables before deploying the app.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Guide detailing the sequence for deploying the CyberGenesis Land Mint DApp and its canisters to mainnet.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: High-level deployment steps emphasizing correct canister deployment order and environment setup.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing project architecture, multi‑canister system design, and component responsibilities.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Brief guide listing required environment variables for the frontend .env file.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide explaining environment configuration and backend canister deployment to resolve common errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required Bloom implementation changes in CubeVisualization.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries of all frontend source files and their roles in the application.
frontend/.env: Mainnet environment configuration with canister IDs, stability settings, and admin authorization for uploads.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required variables, canister IDs, and debug options for different networks.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, profile setup, and reinitialization UI states.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset canister interface, including asset types, user roles, and admin operations.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory describing the asset canister’s asset management, admin, access control, and user profile methods.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL for the main backend canister defining land data, rewards, modifiers, caches, upgrades, and user/profile functions.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin-only tool for uploading GLB models with health checks, authorization, drag‑and‑drop, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin UI for health‑checking the asset canister and uploading GLB files with validation and progress simulation.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostics tool performing multi‑step tests on asset and land canisters, logging results and checking cycles and permissions.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Admin-only UI logic for running pre-checks and reinitialization steps on the Asset Canister, including status tracking and authorization checks.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs health checks against multiple gateways for Land and Asset canisters, measuring response times and generating status reports and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays whether environment variables for canister IDs match expected values and highlights any mismatches.
Validates required environment variables at runtime and shows a fixed error banner with missing or invalid config details.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D cosmic starfield and nebula background using an HTML canvas.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Renders biome-specific 3D land models with Three.js, including lighting sync and a custom bloom post-processing pipeline.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file; all 3D logic was moved elsewhere.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks health of system canisters, displays their status, and refreshes results with actor calls and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Handles loot cache discovery and processing logic, including token cost checks, actor calls, and UI state for operations.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches component errors and displays a styled fallback message.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting workflows using actor queries and mutation handlers.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land stats, reward claiming, upgrades, and modifier actions with cooldown tracking and admin debugging tools.
Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies biome-based PBR material tweaks, and auto-fits the camera to the model.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Displays navigation UI for selecting between land plots, showing name, biome translation, and index.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and displays the top 10 lands ranked by token balance with styled placement indicators.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive map canvas with drag, zoom, and pinch controls, centering on the user’s land and drawing biome markers.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Shows active marketplace listings with filtering, buying, and listing functionality for lands and modifiers.
Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Performs periodic health checks on the asset canister and displays connection status, latency, and uptime.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders a full‑screen animated 2D canvas with moving particles and connecting lines, including resize handling and animation cleanup.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides UI to edit a land plot’s name and decoration URL, syncing with backend mutations and showing loading states.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Displays a Plug wallet connect button or account menu with copy and disconnect actions based on connection state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile creation form that saves a user’s name via mutation and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Full‑screen overlay showing connection retry progress, active gateway, and a visual progress bar.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors, logs them, shows a fallback UI, and allows reset.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines mainnet configuration for canister IDs, URLs, feature flags, and helpers for initialization and validation.
Provides a React context for managing Plug wallet connection state, actor creation, and connect/disconnect actions.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Defines a static list of placeholder modifier items with IDs, names, tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for governance backend interfaces, including proposals, votes, and staking/voting result types.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory describing the governance backend service, records, and variant result types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Provides automatic actor reinitialization with retry logic, gateway rotation, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Hook combining actor retrieval with initialization checks and progressive polling to verify backend readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Initializes an asset canister actor with environment validation, gateway health checks, and retry logic. Provides automatic failover across IC gateways and ensures stable agent setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Checks the asset canister’s /health endpoint with a delay and timeout, returning a simple health status. Updates state based on fetch success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Uploads GLB files to the asset canister using Plug wallet authentication and reports progress. Converts file bytes and calls uploadLandModel on the canister actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Creates a governance canister actor with retry, timeout, and gateway selection logic. Uses Internet Identity for authentication and handles initialization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient. Handles login, stored identity loading, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes a marketplace canister actor with retries, failover gateway selection, and identity support. Manages loading, errors, and agent configuration.
Provides React Query mutation hooks using Plug Wallet to create actors and execute token, marketplace, and governance transactions with automatic query invalidation and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder governance/marketplace types via authenticated actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes a token canister actor with retry, gateway failover, and timeout logic using the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining dark theme variables, fonts, neon effects, and glassmorphism UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build metadata and utilities for cache-busting URLs and logging build information.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Implements global debug utilities for 3D rendering, including logging, GPU diagnostics, performance metrics, and renderer detection.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides helpers to format and parse ICRC‑1 token amounts with decimal handling and thousand separators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for the marketplace canister, including listings, buy results, and service methods.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the marketplace canister interface, types, and query/mutation methods.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders the full modifier collection with rarity tiers, counts, and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard handling land data loading, tab navigation, and rendering various game components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity login flow and animated visual backgrounds.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Displays land initialization status and loader while waiting for land data to be ready.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Page for verifying configured canister IDs with a dedicated verification component.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for the token canister including accounts, transfers, errors, metadata, and admin methods.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines IDL types and service methods for token operations including balance, transfer, metadata, total supply, and minting.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for WebGPU interfaces to enable API usage without compiler errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving persisted values, and cleaning URL hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and container settings with plugin integration.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config setting up React, environment variables, build timestamped asset naming, WASM handling, and dev server proxying.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, architecture notes, and known issues for a 3D React/Three.js app with custom bloom and rendering rules.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian‑language deployment overview with prerequisites and quick start steps for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Bash script that uploads .glb model files to an ICP mainnet asset canister, handling validation, base64 conversion, rate limiting, and post‑upload verification.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Shell script to batch‑upload GLB model assets to an AssetCanister using dfx and verify uploaded files.
unknown.txt: Contains a brief instruction referencing testing a health endpoint.
